column2: [From.GetTitledName] would like to hire some of my men for [From.GetHerHis] current war. [From.GetSheHeCap] offers me [From.global_rtp_mercenary_pay.GetValue] gold for [From.global_rtp_mercenary_men.GetValue] men.
We are worth more than that.

[From.GetTitledName] would like to hire some of my men for [From.GetHerHis] current war against a different religion. I would gain [From.global_rtp_mercenary_pay.GetValue] piety for sending [From.global_rtp_mercenary_men.GetValue] men to [From.GetHerHis] aid.
